titlepage.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory of the Czechoslovak Independent Publications Collection
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California

did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Hoover Institution on War, Revolution, and Peace

did.abstract: Serial issues, books, and pamphlets, published by underground and uncensored presses in Czechoslovakia, relating to political and cultural conditions in Czechoslovakia.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Czechoslovak independent publications collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog Socrates at http://library.stanford.edu/webcat. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in Socrates is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Serial issues, books, and pamphlets, published by underground and uncensored presses in Czechoslovakia, relating to political and cultural conditions in Czechoslovakia.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the repository's online public access catalog.
